articles.author: Emily Adams, USA TODAY
articles.title: Ducks can swear. One named Ripper was recorded calling someone a 'bloody fool' - USA TODAY
articles.description: An Australian musk duck named Ripper revealed the species' unique ability to mimic human sounds when he learned how to say "you bloody fool."
articles.content:
In English, ducks say "quack quack," while they say "cua cua" in Spanish. French ducks say "coin coin."
But an Australian duck named Ripper is a little different: He calls you a "bloody fool."
Care… [+3425 chars]
